official-title.#text:
To prohibit the obligation or expenditure of funds made
		  available to any Federal department or agency for any fiscal year to provide
		  military assistance to any of the armed combatants in Syria absent express
		  prior statutory authorization from Congress.

header.#text:
Prohibition on obligation and
			 expenditure of funds to provide military assistance to any of the armed
			 combatants in Syria

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 2432 IH: To prohibit the obligation or expenditure of funds made available to any Federal department or agency for any fiscal year to provide military assistance to any of the armed combatants in Syria absent express prior statutory authorization from Congress.
